column6: If you thought the revelation of the Ghost Panther's identity was a game-changer...prepare yourself for the aftershock!  Perfect Storm's campaign to annex Genosha kicks into high gear, but can the X-Men take down the foe with the face of a friend? It's Wakanda vs. The World...and X-Legend Chris Claremont's twistiest tale of international intrigue yet!  32 PGS./Rated A ...$3.99
